name: OnePecMan
description:
We have tried ! We came here a year too early. BUT we have nice real animation and music theme. I hope you enjoy. BTW we couldn't implement the constraint logic. Sorry. What was "out of control" was our organization

We enjoyed doing this game jam, see you next year

Level Designer : Mikael Canovas - Jean Talaban

Animation : Yrax

Music : LittleBigTri

Developper : Christopher Grassi - Tristan

Bisous.

-La team fuet catalan-
